ConcurrencyFailure.description: Optimistic concurrency failure, object has been modified.
ConcurrencyFailure.message: The object has been modified by another user.

RecoveryCodeRedemptionFailed.message: The recovery code could not be redeemed.

LoginAlreadyAssociated.description: A user with this external login already exists.
LoginAlreadyAssociated.message: This external login is already associated with an account.

InvalidEmail.message: The provided email address is invalid.

DuplicateUserName.message: This username is already in use.

DuplicateEmail.message: This email address is already in use.

InvalidRoleName.message: This role name contains invalid characters.

DuplicateRoleName.message: This role name is already in use.

UserAlreadyHasPassword.description: User already has a password set.
UserAlreadyHasPassword.message: A password already exists for this user.

UserLockoutNotEnabled.description: Lockout is not enabled for this user.
UserLockoutNotEnabled.message: The lockout feature is not enabled.

UserAlreadyInRole.message: The user already has this role.

UserNotInRole.message: The user does not have this role.

PasswordTooShort.description: Password must be at least {0} characters.

PasswordRequiresUniqueChars.description: Password must use at least {0} different characters.
PasswordRequiresUniqueChars.message: The password requires more unique characters.

PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric.description: Password must contain at least one special character.
PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric.message: A special character is required in the password.

PasswordRequiresDigit.description: Password must contain at least one digit.
PasswordRequiresDigit.message: A digit is required in the password.

PasswordRequiresLower.description: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
PasswordRequiresLower.message: A lowercase letter is required in the password.

PasswordRequiresUpper.description: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PasswordRequiresUpper.message: An uppercase letter is required in the password.
